rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don't control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, discover 4. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
